sentences.translation: I am looking forward to tomorrow's dinner.

sentences.simplifiedText: 经过一周的辛苦工作，我非常期待这个周末可以好好休息。
sentences.traditionalText: 經過一周的辛苦工作，我非常期待這個週末可以好好休息。
sentences.pinyin: jīngguò yīzhōu de xīnkǔ gōngzuò, wǒ fēicháng qīdài zhège zhōumò kěyǐ hǎohǎo xiūxí.
sentences.translation: After a week of hard work, I am very much looking forward to a good rest this weekend.

sentences.pinyin: wǒ duì nǐ yǒu hěn gāo de qī dài。
sentences.translation: I have high expectations of you.

sentences.simplifiedText: 面对新的挑战，我对自己的期待也越来越高。
sentences.traditionalText: 面對新的挑戰，我對自己的期待也越來越高。
sentences.pinyin: miàn duì xīn de tiǎo zhàn, wǒ duì zì jǐ de qī dài yě yuè lái yuè gāo。
sentences.translation: Facing new challenges, my expectations for myself are also getting higher.
